text:
="preserve">Thembekile Kimi Makwetu (1966 – 11 November 2020) was a South African accountant and politician. He was the Auditor-General of South Africa between 2013 and 2020 during the Jacob Zuma and Cyril Ramaphosa administrations. He was born in Cape Town, South Africa.
Makwetu died of lung cancer on 11 November 2020 in Johannesburg at the age of 54.
